nodes.text: Luthik Uwyr was a male Human Dark Jedi who served the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

In about 1 ABY, Uwyr traveled to the planet Dantooine, where he encountered a spacer. Uwyr sensed great anger in the spacer, so sent the individual to kill a voritor lizard. The individual was successful and afterwards, Uwyr sent the spacer to deliver a holocron, then to kill an untrained Jedi Padawan.
Luthik Uwyr was a non-player character in the online game Star Wars Galaxies. However, he was removed from the game in 2006.
Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided (First appearance)
